name: Death Splash
description:
An unfinished prototype that's pretty boring without any weapon upgrades and only one basic enemy type...

Survive for as long as possible!

How to play
Use WASD to move.

Aim with mouse or arrow keys. Mouse is recommended!

Shoot with  either Space, Left CTRL, or Left Mouse Button.

Dash with either Left Shift or Right Mouse Button

Press ESC to toggle pause menu
